ipv6-prefix.title: Ipv6 prefix to use to setup the new re6st network
ipv6-prefix.description: Prefix ipv6 used by re6st to setup network. It is something like 2001:db8:42::/48

key-size.title: Number of bit to use for certificate generation
key-size.description: Specify the size of certificate generated by re6st. by default, generate 2048-bit key length

anonymous-prefix-length.title: Length of allocated anonymous prefixes.
anonymous-prefix-length.description: Length of allocated anonymous prefixes. 0 is unset.

mailhost.title: SMTP host to send confirmation emails.
mailhost.description: SMTP host to send confirmation emails. Not needed if when token is requested from slave instances.

ipv4-net.title: Enable ipv4 (ip/NET P_LENGTH).
ipv4-net.description: Enable ipv4 (ip/NET P_LENGTH). Each node is assigned a subnet of length PLEN, inside network IP/N. Ex: 10.42.0.0/16 8

client-count.title: Number of client tunnels to set up.
client-count.description: Number of client tunnels to set up.

tunnel-refresh.title: Interval in seconds between two tunnel refresh.
tunnel-refresh.description: Interval in seconds between two tunnel refresh: the worst tunnel is closed if the number of client tunnels has reached its maximum number (client-count).

max-clients.title: Maximum number of accepted clients per OpenVPN server.
max-clients.description: Maximum number of accepted clients per OpenVPN server. (if unset or 0: client-count * 2, which actually represents the average number of tunnels to other peers)

hello.title: Hello interval in seconds, for both wired and wireless connections.
hello.description: Hello interval in seconds, for both wired and wireless connections. OpenVPN ping-exit option is set to 4 times the hello interval. It takes between 3 and 4 times the hello interval for Babel to re-establish connection with a node for which the direct connection has been cut.

min-protocol.title: Reject nodes that are too old.
min-protocol.description: Reject nodes that are too old. Default is unset.

encrypt.title: Specify that tunnels should be encrypted.
encrypt.description: Specify that tunnels should be encrypted.

same-country.title: Same Country
same-country.description: Prevent tunnelling accross borders of listed countries
